name: Tilius
description:
A fair IQ and luck is needed, few have managed to go passed level 3

You have 2 minutes, It's you against Tilius, although the aim of the game is to break as many horizontals bars as possible... It's Tilius who decides when you can move to the next level.

Some times it's easy...sometimes it's hard...it depends on how Tilius woke up in the morning.

But don't feel so sharp yet. You might finish the game...but the aim is to get the highest points.

Good Luck^^
